column4: How do I set it up so i can add folders or files to anywhere I want using the File Browser? Currently I can only add files to my accounts home folder..
well you are really only suppose to touch files in your $HOME
It is my computer I decide if I want to remove that file even if it is needed for the os to start..

no, I agree with you.  I am just saying that the easiest way to do things is let apt take care of installing and removing stuff and just sticking to $HOME.  There are of course exceptions, but I don't think it's that often that you would need a shortcut on your desktop :)
